about.t1: I am an electronic technician specialized in FTTH technology. I have been interested in programming for a long time and today I have decided to completely change my career path by dedicating myself to front-end development.
about.t2: I am constantly acquiring knowledge that helps me grow in this world of web programming, learning technologies such as React, Firebase, Bootstrap, NextJS, Sass, HTML, CSS and Javascript.
